verses.verse: And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> out of <S%H4480>Judah<s%> <S%H3063><s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel:<s%> and <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> a <S%H1121>child<s%> shall be <S%H3205>born<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> by <S%H8034>name;<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee shall he <S%H2076>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> that burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and <S%H120>men's<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%> shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee.

And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> a <S%H4159>sign<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H4159>sign<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H7167>rent,<s%> and the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H5921>upon<s%> it shall be poured <S%H8210>out.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> that he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Lay <S%H8610>hold<s%> on him. And his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, dried <S%H3001>up,<s%> so that he <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> pull it in <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him.

The <S%H4196>altar<s%> also was <S%H7167>rent,<s%> and the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> poured <S%H8210>out<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> according to the <S%H4159>sign<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2470>Entreat<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> me, that my <S%H3027>hand<s%> may be restored me <S%H7725>again.<s%> <S%H413><s%> And the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2470>besought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6440>LORD,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> was restored him <S%H7725>again,<s%> <S%H413><s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> as it was <S%H7223>before.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H935>Come<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me, and <S%H5582>refresh<s%> thyself, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee a <S%H4991>reward.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> thou wilt <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> thine <S%H1004>house,<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee, <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> place: <S%H4725><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> was it <S%H6680>charged<s%> me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H398>Eat<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> turn <S%H7725>again<s%> by the same <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou <S%H1980>camest.<s%>

So he <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>

Now there <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> an <S%H259>old<s%> <S%H2205><s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel;<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel:<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> them they <S%H5608>told<s%> also to their <S%H1>father.<s%>

And their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H335>What<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> he? For his <S%H1121>sons<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>went,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H4480>Judah.<s%> <S%H3063><s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H2280>Saddle<s%> me the <S%H2543>ass.<s%> So they <S%H2280>saddled<s%> him the <S%H2543>ass:<s%> and he <S%H7392>rode<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%>

And <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> him <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> an <S%H424>oak:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, Art <S%H859>thou<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H935>camest<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H3063>Judah?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am.
Then he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H1980>Come<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me, and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H3201>may<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee, nor go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee: <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee in <S%H2088>this<s%> place: <S%H4725><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> it was <S%H1697>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> turn <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou <S%H1980>camest.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H589>I<s%> am a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> as thou art; and an <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Bring him <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee <S%H413>into<s%> thine <S%H1004>house,<s%> that he may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%> But he <S%H3584>lied<s%> unto him.
So he went <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H7979>table,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> brought him back: <S%H7725><s%>

And he <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3282>Forasmuch<s%> <S%H3588><s%> as thou hast <S%H4784>disobeyed<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee,

But camest <S%H7725>back,<s%> and hast <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H8354>drunk<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H4725>place,<s%> of the <S%H834>which<s%> the LORD did <S%H1696>say<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thee, <S%H398>Eat<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H4325>water;<s%> thy <S%H5038>carcass<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6913>sepulcher<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H8354>drunk,<s%> that he <S%H2280>saddled<s%> for him the <S%H2543>ass,<s%> to wit, for the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had brought <S%H7725>back.<s%>

And when he was <S%H1980>gone,<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H4672>met<s%> him by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H4191>slew<s%> him: and his <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H2543>ass<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> it, the <S%H738>lion<s%> also <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> passed <S%H5674>by,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass:<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1696>told<s%> it in the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt.<s%>

And when the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> brought him <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> thereof, he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1931>It<s%> is the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was <S%H4784>disobedient<s%> <S%H853>unto<s%> the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him unto the <S%H738>lion,<s%> which hath <S%H7665>torn<s%> him, and <S%H4191>slain<s%> him, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto him.
And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2280>Saddle<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> the <S%H2543>ass.<s%> And they <S%H2280>saddled<s%> him.

And he <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H2543>ass<s%> and the <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H5038>carcass:<s%> the <S%H738>lion<s%> had <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5038>carcass,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7665>torn<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2543>ass.<s%>

And the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> took <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5038>carcass<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5117>laid<s%> it <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and brought it <S%H7725>back:<s%> and the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> to <S%H5594>mourn<s%> and to <S%H6912>bury<s%> him.
And he <S%H5117>laid<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5038>carcass<s%> in his own <S%H6913>grave;<s%> and they <S%H5594>mourned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him, saying, <S%H1945>Alas,<s%> my <S%H251>brother!<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H6912>buried<s%> him, that he <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> When I am <S%H4191>dead,<s%> then <S%H6912>bury<s%> me in the <S%H6913>sepulcher<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H6912>buried;<s%> <S%H5117>lay<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> his bones: <S%H6106><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H1697>saying<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7121>cried<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> shall surely come to <S%H1961>pass.<s%> <S%H1961><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> from his evil <S%H4480>way,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> <S%H7451><s%> but <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> of the <S%H4480>lowest<s%> <S%H7098><s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places:<s%> whosoever <S%H2655>would,<s%> he <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3027><s%> him, and he <S%H1961>became<s%> one of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H2403>sin<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam,<s%> even to cut it <S%H3582>off,<s%> and to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> it from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
